
############################## Experiment details ##############################

dataset: femnist
dataset_dir: ../data/femnist/
output_dir: output/debug_memory_leak/fedavg_cnn-2022-08-06_23:11:07/
model: cnn
num_rounds: 100
eval_every: 10
ServerType: <class 'rayleaf.entities.server.Server'>
client_types: [(<class 'rayleaf.entities.client.Client'>, 100)]
clients_per_round: 10
client_lr: 0.06
batch_size: 64
seed: 0
use_val_set: False
num_epochs: 10
gpus_per_client_cluster: 1
num_client_clusters: 2
save_model: False

############################## Simulation ##############################

Spawning 2 ClientClusters using cuda device (this may take a while)
100 total clients: 100 Clients
